EmailTemplate.name: ENG-QoS-Nurture.ENG-QOS-Early-01.01-n-Dimension-e-Book
EmailTemplate.subject: Can You Solve The Modern Datacenter's Greatest Challenge?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic_The-Desired-State.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-QOS&utm_content=Early01]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your data center is more complex than you give it credit for. With a multitude of resources (CPU, RAM, IOPs, NetIO, Balloon, Swap, Buffer, Flow...) whose utilization can assume innumerably varied states affecting performance, how do you find a state that satisfies all of the inherent tradeoffs? What about when we add public and private cloud deployments, containers or webscale application architectures?All of these tradeoffs combine to create an n-dimensional problem whose solution is far beyond human scale. How can we, as human beings, solve this problem?
<[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic_The-Desired-State.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-QOS&utm_content=Early01]]> -The Turbonomic Team
